name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, every year when it snows, people often say "Beijing turns into Beiping in seconds after the snow", which inexplicably caused strong dissatisfaction among patriots, criticizing this as nostalgia for the Republic of China. This has led to the current ban of this topic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, the China Internet Information Office announced a one-month "Clear and Bright" campaign to rectify short videos.
It emphasizes rectifying rumors involving people's livelihood, fabricating plots to help vulnerable groups in society, spreading wrong ideas, inciting ethnic hatred or regional discrimination. Spreading wrong views on marriage and love, deliberately creating gender confrontation. Conveying wrong values, spreading wrong career views, advocating unscrupulous means and negative world-weariness, etc.
At the same time, it emphasizes optimizing the traffic mechanism, and cannot unilaterally use likes and forwarding rates as the basis for traffic distribution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 11, Shenzhen Longhua Bus Station.
Local law enforcement agencies began to clear out those gods sleeping on the streets.
